contextId.occurrenceNote: These words both mean that Hannah is sad and annoyed because her rival has been provoking her. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
The words "discouraged" and "greatly afraid" mean basically the same thing and emphasize the intensity of their fear. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
contextId.glQuote: they were discouraged and greatly afraid

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the words "saw" and "knew" share similar meanings and emphasize that Saul knew with certainty. Alternate translation: "Saul recognized" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
These two words mean almost the same thing and can be translated as one phrase. Alternate translation: "Know for sure" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
